metadata.title: CVE-2024-23837 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: LibHTP is a security-aware parser for the HTTP protocol. Crafted trafficcan cause excessive processing time of HTTP headers, leading to denial ofservice. This issue is addressed in 0.5.46.

criterions.comment: libhtp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
